Description: Fragment of a closed vessel. A sherd from a Memphis Black Ware closed vessel, perhaps a flask with a flattened circular body, decorated with a gorgon's head in relief; much is missing. Micaceous dark-grey Nile silt, covered with a black slip.
Bibliographic references: Terracotta / Catalogue of Terracottas in the British Museum (3652)
Acquisition notes: Purchased from James Ede as part of a group of 10 pieces (2002.4-19.1 - 7; 2002.4-20.1; 2002.4-22.1 and 2002.4-23.1)
